text: Charlotte Drijvers (born 1999) is a Dutch softball player from Zaltbommel. She plays as a catcher. In the Dutch higest league she plays with Roef! and she plays in the summer period in the United States. She is member of the Netherlands women's national softball team. With the national team she became European champion at the 2022 Women's Softball European Championship. Her sister Sietske Drijvers is also a softball player. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch softball players Category:Sportswomen
title: Charlotte Drijvers
